message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. After considering your interest, I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality product at a competitive price.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to find a price that works better for me.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value I place on it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $10,500 is a good price for you, but I'm still looking to get a better deal. Considering the value I place on the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,500. This is a fair compromise that benefits both of us.
